div.bibl: Russian Herald, (Russkii Viestnik), Nov. 13, 1924. A MEETING OF "SPECIALISTS," ETC.

body.p: At the last business meeting of the Union of Russian Intellectuals it was decided to expand the activities of the Society by arranging lectures, concerts and other cultural enterprises which will be open for the general public.
Several committees were appointed, to wit: (1) for the organizing of a library and a reading room; (2) for the arranging of lectures, and (3) for the arranging of entertainments.
Eleven new members were admitted into the Union.
